sentences.english: This is because of the impurity nitride in glass.
sentences.chinese: 本文認爲這是玻璃內部所含的雜質氮化物所致。

sentences.english: Chemical products often need coned of their trace iron contents as impurity.
sentences.chinese: 化工產品大多需控制其痕量雜質鐵含量。

sentences.english: All contents of the impurities in the nominal value shall not be greater than 3%.
sentences.chinese: 各雜質組分含量標稱值不確定度不得大於3%。

sentences.english: Colorless transparent liquid, no mechanical impurities, allowing microstrip opalescence.
sentences.chinese: 無色透明液體，無機械雜質，允許微帶乳光。

sentences.english: The role of dopants and contaminants in degradation cannot be ignored .
sentences.chinese: 雜質和污染對退化的作用不能忽視。

sentences.english: Coexisting tetracycline and anhydrochlorotetracycline do not interfere with the determination of chlorotetracycline.
sentences.chinese: 共存四環素和脫水金黴素雜質不干擾金黴素測定。

sentences.english: Active carbon adsorbs poisonous gases and impurities in liquids.
sentences.chinese: 活性炭吸附毒氣和液體中的雜質。

sentences.english: Lack of specificity for an assay for release may be compensated for by impurities testing.
sentences.chinese: 缺少專屬性數據時可用雜質測試的數據來補償。

sentences.english: The coarse waste can be automatically excluded; the operation is auto metical.
sentences.chinese: 雜質粗料自動排除，可以實現準自動化作業。

sentences.english: AIM To determine the exact chemical structure of the main related substance in mosapride citrate.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定枸櫞酸莫沙必利有關雜質的結構。

sentences.english: These use carbon or mesh to catch  impurities.
sentences.chinese: 這些使用碳或篩網來過濾雜質。

sentences.english: An aqueous caustic solution removes carrier gas impurities harmful to the detector cell.
sentences.chinese: 苛性堿溶液去除運載氣體中對檢測元件有害的雜質。

sentences.english: Fewer impurities, the quality is high-grade quartz ore.
sentences.chinese: 雜質少，是高品位的優質石英礦。

sentences.english: The application of the NRG is not essentially limited to the pure impurity systems.
sentences.chinese: NRG的應用並不侷限於單純的量子雜質模型。

sentences.english: Storage and transportation of water and prevent the infiltration of impurities, to avoid mixed with other oil.
sentences.chinese: 儲運中防止水份和雜質混入，避免與其它油相混。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The method is accurate and sensitive with no endogenous interference.
sentences.chinese: 結論該方法靈敏度高，無雜質干擾，結果準確。
